protocol.name: P-MEXP-11749
protocol.text: Plant Material and Growth Conditions: Arabidopsis thaliana (L.) plants (col ecotype) were raised in liquid culture and transferred in a medium with or without Pi for evaluating the short-(3, 6 and 12 h pooled) and medium-(1 and 2 d pooled) term effects of Pi deficiency on the gene expression.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11782
protocol.text: Plant material and growth conditions: For studying long-term effects of Pi deficiency, surface-sterilized seeds of Arabidopsis thaliana (WS ecotype) were sown in square (12 x12 cm) Petri dishes on MS/10 medium (with 0.5 % sucrose, 0.8 % agar) and supplemented with either 500 ?M (P+) or 5 ?M (P-) Pi and plants were grown vertically in a growth chamber (14h light / 10h dark, 22°/18°C, 150?mol.s-1.m-2). Since some Arabidopsis genes are regulated by diurnal rhythm and circadian clocks, the roots and the leaves were harvested separately at the beginning and at the end of the photoperiod and pooled. Samples were rinsed with distilled water, blot-dried and frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11820
protocol.text: Short term transfer : plantlets were grown in MS medium, then after rinsing were transferred for 3, 6 and 12h (pooled) in high phosphate (1mM).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12139
protocol.text: Medium term transfer : plantlets were grown in MS medium, then after rinsing were transferred for 1 and 2 days (pooled) in high phosphate (1mM).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12140
protocol.text: Leaves of long term experiment : plantlets were grown vertically during 10 days in solid MS medium, supplemented with high phosphate (0.5 mM). Leaves were harvested separately.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12141
protocol.text: Roots of long term experiment : plantlets were grown vertically during 10 days in solid MS medium, supplemented with high phosphate (0.5 mM). Roots were harvested separately.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12143
protocol.text: Short term transfer : plantlets were grown in MS medium, then after rinsing were transferred for 3, 6 and 12h (pooled) in a medium without phosphate.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12144
protocol.text: Medium term transfer : plantlets were grown in MS medium, then after rinsing were transferred for 1 and 2 days (pooled) in a medium without phosphate.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12145
protocol.text: Leaves of long term experiment : plantlets were grown vertically during 10 days in solid MS medium, supplemented with low phosphate (0.005 mM). Leaves were harvested separately.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12146
protocol.text: Roots of long term experiment : plantlets were grown vertically during 10 days in solid MS medium, supplemented with low phosphate (0.005 mM). Roots were harvested separately.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12148
text: RNA Extraction and cRNA Preparation: Total RNA from shoot and root (long-term) and from the whole plant (short- and medium-term) was isolated by hot phenol-chloroforme and lithium chloride precipitation. cRNA was prepared following the manufacturer’s instructions (

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12288
protocol.text: Refer to the Affymetrix Expression Analysis Technical Manual, chapter 3, "Synthesis of biotin-labeled cRNA (IVT) and chapter 4, "Control of cRNA preparation".
